products.name: Hot Chocolate
products.description: Steamed milk and mocha sauce topped with sweetened whipped cream and a chocolate-flavored drizzle. A timeless classic made to sweeten your spirits..

products.name: Hot Tea
products.description: Black tea infused with warm clove, cardamom, cinnamon and ginger notes. A bold, distinctive chai tea.

products.name: Latte
products.description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam. A perfect milk-forward warm-up.

products.name: Blueberry Muffin
products.description: This delicious muffin is dotted throughout with sweet, juicy blueberries and a hint of lemon and dusted on top with sugar for a delightfully crunchy texture.

products.name: Crossiant
products.description: Light, flaky, real butter croissant dough wrapped around two chocolate batons creates a perfect balance that'll satisfy your sweet tooth and bring on a moment of bliss.

products.name: Doughnut
products.description: A doughnut glazed with delicious, sweet icing—made with old-fashioned scrumptiousness.
